item.title: 香港立法会一致通过了一项严格的保安法，该法在提交 11 天后即获得通过，速度异常之快。
item.description:
Hong Kong's legislature has unanimously passed a strict security law, 11 days after it was tabled in an unusually fast turnaround. https://t.co/wHyoftnfq4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 组织者说，反拜登 "未承诺 "运动在几个州的初选中取得相对成功后，计划在今年秋天的大选中继续向总统施压。
item.description:
The anti-Biden "uncommitted" movement plans to continue pressuring the president through the general election this fall after seeing relative success in a few state primaries, organizers said. https://t.co/FzMxlUcWo0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在不到两周的时间里，一家全球图片社第二次对威尔士王妃凯特分享的王室家族照片发出了编辑通知。
item.description:
For the second time in less than two weeks, a global photo agency has issued an editing notice on a royal family photo shared by Kate, the Princess of Wales. https://t.co/6OSr0zSjI6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: "在康普顿长大的我从来没有想过，有一天我会和我儿时的一些英雄们一起出现在这里。"周二，Dr. Dre 与 Snoop Dogg、Eminem、50 Cent 和 Jimmy Iovine 一起为他在好莱坞星光大道上的明星揭幕。
item.description:
“Growing up in Compton I never imagined that I would one day be represented here among some of my childhood heroes.”

Dr. Dre was joined by Snoop Dogg, Eminem, 50 Cent and Jimmy Iovine as his star was unveiled Tuesday on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. https://t.co/msl64AUJi8 pic.twitter.com/vCTG7PKlcH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 召回警报：乔氏超市（Trader Joe's）在一份在线声明中宣布，由于可能受到沙门氏菌污染，该店将召回部分批次的少盐 50%烘烤和加盐全腰果。
item.description:
RECALL ALERT: Trader Joe's is recalling certain batches of its 50% Less Salt Roasted & Salted Whole Cashews due to potential salmonella contamination, the store announced in a statement online. https://t.co/fTJL3GQZi9 pic.twitter.com/sFimuxKia8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 请看：一段视频记录了一列火车在马萨诸塞州铁路道口撞上一辆拖拉机拖车的戏剧性瞬间。
item.description:
SEE IT: Video captured the dramatic moment a train smashed into a tractor-trailer sitting in the middle of a rail crossing in Massachusetts.

Nobody in the incident was injured. https://t.co/B1vha8sdy7 pic.twitter.com/0iiSVQIaem

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 当局称，一辆卡车在加利福尼亚州加油站行驶时，一名无人看管的 3 岁儿童坐在方向盘后，该车致命地撞击了一名 2 岁儿童。
item.description:
An unattended 3-year-old was behind the wheel of a truck left running at a California gas station when the vehicle fatally struck a 2-year-old, authorities said. https://t.co/bAlrtUF7n3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：最高法院驳回了拜登政府提出的干预请求，即在下级法院对德克萨斯州严格的移民执法法提出质疑时，暂时搁置该法。
item.description:
BREAKING: The Supreme Court has rejected a Biden administration request to intervene and keep Texas's strict immigration enforcement law on hold while it is challenged in lower courts. https://t.co/P3XeBlmpwN pic.twitter.com/CwTWcDn4WZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：最高法院驳回了拜登政府的请求，即在下级法院对德克萨斯州被称为 SB 4 的严格移民执法法提出质疑时，最高法院应介入并搁置该法。
item.description:
BREAKING: The Supreme Court has rejected a Biden administration request to intervene and keep Texas's strict immigration enforcement law, known as SB 4, on hold while it is challenged in lower courts. https://t.co/JUrsgKMSHR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 每年三月，佛罗里达最热门的海滩都会挤满来自全国各地的大学生，他们在春假期间尽情享受阳光、饮料和活力。
item.description:
Every March, Florida's hottest beach locations are filled with college students from across the country enjoying the sun, drinks and energy of spring break.

But this year, things are different. https://t.co/PC2SRLPwKs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 巴西前总统雅伊尔-博尔索纳罗周二被正式指控伪造其 COVID-19 疫苗接种数据，这是对这位备受争议的极右翼领导人的首次起诉，可能还会有更多指控。
item.description:
The former president of Brazil, Jair Bolsonaro, was formally accused Tuesday of falsifying his COVID-19 vaccination data, marking the first indictment for the embattled far-right leader, with more allegations potentially in store. https://t.co/gX6rxpQsZh pic.twitter.com/kXywL6jS3l

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 负责监督美国 2021 年从阿富汗撤军的两位最高军事领导人将在众议院一个委员会的听证会上作证，该听证会旨在评估拜登政府在当时的混乱局面中所扮演的角色。
item.description:
The top two military leaders who oversaw the U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan in 2021 are testifying before a House committee in a hearing meant to assess the Biden administration's role in the chaos that unfolded. https://t.co/miMRZ2nkPd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：根据民事起诉书，乔纳森-马约斯（Jonathan Majors）的前女友格蕾丝-贾巴里（Grace Jabbari）以诽谤和其他所谓的伤害为由，起诉了乔纳森-马约斯。
item.description:
BREAKING: Grace Jabbari, the ex-girlfriend of Jonathan Majors, whom he was convicted of assaulting in a trial last year, has sued the actor for defamation and other alleged injuries, according to the civil complaint. https://t.co/fAKzEQUjiM pic.twitter.com/uMugXEkzYx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：根据民事起诉书，乔纳森-马约斯（Jonathan Majors）的前女友格蕾丝-贾巴里（Grace Jabbari）以诽谤和其他所谓的伤害为由，起诉了乔纳森-马约斯。
item.description:

item.title: 在 Dominion 投票系统公司提起的诽谤诉讼中，Overstock 首席执行官帕特里克-伯恩（Patrick Byrne）的代理律师在法庭上承认向执法部门传播了该投票系统公司的机密文件，随后被捕。
item.description:
A lawyer representing Overstock CEO Patrick Byrne in a defamation lawsuit filed by Dominion Voting Systems was arrested after acknowledging in court disseminating confidential documents from the voting machine company to law enforcement. https://t.co/yt7HaGD5W4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 根据发表在《英国医学杂志》上的一项新研究，COVID-19 疫苗可将感染 COVID 后发生心力衰竭的风险降低 55%，血栓的风险降低 78%。
item.description:
COVID-19 vaccines were found to cut the risk of heart failure by up to 55% and blood clots by up to 78% following COVID infection, according to a new study published in the British Medical Journal. https://t.co/tbJ0UopzIo pic.twitter.com/e2JKqBAJfx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 据研究人员称，美国石油和天然气生产排放的甲烷比以前想象的要多，每年造成的环境损害高达数十亿美元。
item.description:
The U.S. is emitting more methane from oil and gas production than previously thought — and it's causing billions of dollars in environmental damage per year, according to researchers. https://t.co/ftJEqBBi0L

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: Lady Gaga 宣布将于今年晚些时候重返舞台。
item.description:
Lady Gaga has announced a return to the stage for later this year. https://t.co/3jhAR1cp3c

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国前总统特朗普的律师周一表示，特朗普在获得保释金以履行 4.64 亿美元的民事欺诈判决方面正面临 "难以克服的困难"。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump is facing "insurmountable difficulties" in obtaining a bond to satisfy the $464 million civil fraud judgment, his attorneys said Monday. https://t.co/RxMGDtcmtJ pic.twitter.com/pw13NhgU7X

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 奥普拉-温弗瑞（Oprah Winfrey）在公开透露自己使用药物减肥的消息几个月后，又回到了电视荧屏上，聚焦这一话题。
item.description:
Just months after revealing publicly that she uses medication for weight loss, Oprah Winfrey has returned to television to shine a spotlight on the topic. https://t.co/xx7523XZpE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 一名法官允许继续审理与 2022 年纽约水牛城 Tops 超市致命枪击案有关的针对 YouTube 和 Reddit 的诉讼。
item.description:
A judge has allowed the lawsuit against YouTube and Reddit, related to the 2022 deadly Tops supermarket shooting in Buffalo, New York, to move forward. https://t.co/t2tCJYoAiM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：前密西西比州治安官亨特-埃尔沃德（Hunter Elward）因 2023 年 1 月对两名黑人实施酷刑而认罪，周二在联邦法院被判处约 20 年监禁。
item.description:
JUST IN: Former Mississippi sheriff's deputy Hunter Elward was sentenced in federal court Tuesday to roughly 20 years after pleading guilty to the January 2023 torture of two Black men. https://t.co/RKXeTTbyVi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁慈善家兼作家麦肯齐-斯科特（MacKenzie Scott）周二宣布，她将向 360 多个组织捐赠 6.4 亿美元，以响应她去年发起的申请程序。
item.description:
Billionaire philanthropist and author MacKenzie Scott announced Tuesday that she would give $640 million to more than 360 organizations in response to an application process she launched last year. https://t.co/WMOjDS0Vb5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 英国皇家造币厂（Royal Mint）推出了一枚 50 便士的特别硬币，上面印有《星球大战》中标志性的 "千年隼"（Millennium Falcon）。
item.description:
Britain's Royal Mint have unveiled a special 50 pence coin featuring Star Wars' iconic Millennium Falcon. pic.twitter.com/rNmQLqTsd3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 国会领导人和白宫已就如何为国土安全部提供资金达成协议，这是防止政府部分关门的最后障碍之一。
item.description:
Congressional leaders and the White House have reached an agreement on how to fund the Dept. of Homeland Security, one of the last hurdles to prevent an approaching partial government shutdown deadline Friday. https://t.co/BxPKxAZ3tr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在荷兰郁金香花田春意盎然之际，一个人工智能机器人成为根除花田病害的新型高科技武器。
item.description:
An artificial intelligence robot is a new high-tech weapon in the battle to root out disease from Dutch tulip fields as they erupt into a riot of springtime color. https://t.co/aVY7Stb7B6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 周二晚开奖前，百万大奖奖金已飙升至 8.75 亿美元。
